properties.headline: Freeze Warning issued February 3 at 12:06PM PST until February 4 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low
as 31 expected. For the Wind Advisory, northeast winds 25 to 35
mph with gusts up to 55 mph. For the Freeze Watch, sub-
freezing temperatures as low as 33 possible.

* WHERE...Santa Monica Mountains.

* WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 1 AM to 9 AM PST Tuesday.
For the Wind Advisory, until 9 AM PST Wednesday. For the
Freeze Watch, from late Tuesday night through Wednesday
morning.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and
make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may
result. Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops and other
sensitive vegetation. Extended exposure to cold can cause
hypothermia for animals and people. Vehicle windshields will
be frosted.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Plan for
extra time to defrost vehicle windshields.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST WEDNESDAY... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM PST TUESDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING
